releaseNotes: We've rolled back to including audio content in app until we can ensure high download speeds for all users, worldwide.
description:
Fun. Immersive. Beautiful. Calming. Engaging. Grounding.

Rated as one of the top mindfulness apps of 2016 (zparkl.com)

Featured on iTunes as a "NEW APP WE LOVE" and chosen by Apple as a 'RECOMMENDED’ App, Wildflowers Mindfulness is an accessible and engaging experience which blends guided meditation & resilience activities with mood & heart rate tracking.

Consistently ranked as one of the top mobile mindfulness programs, in Wildflowers Mindfulness, you’ll find:

•    Lessons – A blend of gameplay, guided meditations and resilience exercises.
•    Heart Rate Tracking* - Log your heart rate at the start and end of every meditation using the mobile device camera.
•    Personalized Content – Meditation suggestions based on mood.    
•    Insights - Into the relationships between body, mind and meditation.
•    Bite-sized meditations for every-day use.

*Heart rate is calculated via the mobile device camera – no external accessory is required.

Immerse yourself in the leading mobile wellness experience of 2016.

---

Subscription Pricing and terms:

Wildflowers Mindfulness offers two auto-renewing subscription offers:
$9.99 per month
$74.99 per year

Recurring Billing. Cancel Anytime.

These prices are for Canadian customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual changes may be converted to your local currency depending on country of residence.

The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your iTunes account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes account will be conformed when the purchase is confirmed.

Wildflowers Mindfulness also offers a Forever subscription which is paid for by a one-off upfront payment of $149.99 with unlimited access to the Wildflowers Mindfulness Collection forever.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
www.midigitaltherapeutics.com/terms-of-use.html
